title: Main Screen with Auth Guard
description: Modify apps/web/src/routes/index.tsx to add a beforeLoad auth guard that calls getAuth() server function. If no token is returned, throw redirect({ to: '/login', search: { redirect: location.href } }). If token exists, call context.convexQueryClient.serverHttpClient?.setAuth(token) for SSR query support. Replace the placeholder component with a main screen that uses authClient.useSession() to get the current user's name. Display 'Welcome, [Name]' heading. Show a loading state while session isPending. Add a logout button that calls authClient.signOut() with fetchOptions.onSuccess callback navigating to '/login'. Uses ShadCN Button component. Covers US-3, US-4, US-5, US-6, FR-3, FR-8, FR-10, FR-11, UX-5.
